rules_text:
Target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal X land cards, where X is the number of colors to spent to cast this spell. That player mills those cards.
Innervate 4–{4}{U} [i](If you cast this spell for {4}{U}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target noncreature permanent you control. It becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]
